transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Good morning sir.
Executive: Good morning sir.
Customer: Ji sir bataiye.
Executive: Bola tha India Mart office se.
Customer: Ji sir aisa mujhe jis number se baat kar raha tha iski inquiry leni thi Gold Enterprises ki inquiry leni thi sir.
Executive: Kya karni thi sir?
Customer: Gold Enterprises ko bolani thi mujhe sir.
Executive: Okay okay theek hai Gold Enterprises se baat kar rahe hain na sir aap Rampur se sir.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Ji ji bataiye sir.
Customer: Sir usme mera primary number mujhe apna lagwana tha wo dusre dusra hai wo hatana hai.
Executive: Change karwana hai number change karwana hai na aapko.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: To ye secondary wala number aapko primary karwana hai ya fir koi dusra number add karwana hai sir aapko primary mein.
Customer: Nahi na usme primary mein main apna second number lagwana chah raha hu.
Executive: Achha primary number hatana chah rahe hain aap.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Aap ye keh rahe hain ki aapka jo secondary number hai wo primary ho jaye aur secondary number koi na rahe sir aapka na.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai ek minute rukiye abhi aap hai system wagera pe hai India Mart open hai sir aapka.
Customer: Ha open kar lunga open hua to.
Executive: Matlab matlab desktop wagera kuch desktop se change karenge sir aap ya fir use phone mein kyuki thodi kuch cheeze karni padengi usme uske baad kyuki aapka number already yaha pe link ho rakhe hain theek hai to pehle to aapko secondary number yaha se ji ji bataiye.
Customer: Theek theek hai ji main bolta hu main is time mobile par hu sir ab.
Executive: Abhi aapne kis mein open kiya hai phone mein kiya hai aapne kis pe kara hai sir open.
Customer: Maine open kara India Mart open kara hai maine.
Executive: Kis mein sir phone mein kara hai desktop ya laptop wagera mein kara hai kis pe kara hai.
Customer: Phone mein sir phone mein.
Executive: Phone mein kara hai na sir aapne okay aap desktop wagera hai sir kya aapke paas desktop proper proper ho jayega desktop ya laptop hoga to sir proper ho jayega main aapko bata dunga usme sir laptop nahi hai mere paas.
Customer: Laptop bhi nahi hai na.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ek kaam kariye pehle sabse pehle jaiye usme settings mein jaiye aap theek hai sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sabse pehle usme change pe mat jaiye abhi seedhe seedhe aap pehle jaiye usme na aapka jo naam aa raha hoga na hi Rizwan upar left hand side mein three lines ban ke aa rahi hongi sir aapka.
Customer: Aa gaya sir aa gaya.
Executive: Wo settings mein jaiye settings mein preferred number setting hogi sir aapki.
Customer: Setting last mein hai sir.
Executive: Ha settings mein niche ja ke click kariye usme aur usme ek preferred ek preferred number setting ek option aa raha hoga aapka.
Customer: Preferred.
Executive: Preferred preferred number aa gaya sir PNS PNS PNS yes sir PNS bilkul.
Customer: Ho gaya sir.
Executive: Uspe aap jaise hi click kariye usme na aapka jo ab click kariye usme theek hai.
Customer: Kar diya sir.
Executive: Us usme do number aapke active dikha raha hoga pehla aur dusra theek hai to aap ek kaam kariye isme theek hai pehle jo dusra number hai aapka usko yaha se wo kariye hataiye yaha se delete kariye pehle.
Customer: Dusra wala number.
Executive: Ha kyuki aapko wahi primary banana hai to usko hatana padega pehle yaha se hume theek hai na.
Customer: Ji sir ho gaya band kar dijiye.
Executive: Band kar dijiye nahi ek minute rukiye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Check kar leta hu main abhi band show kar raha hai sir abhi bhi active dikha raha hai.
Customer: Yaha se maine sir wo date lagaya.
Executive: Ha usko jo tick laga hua hai usko hata diya aapne.
Customer: Ha hata diya.
Executive: Save kar tick karke save kariye usko save kara aapne.
Customer: Achha ha ho gaya ha theek hai theek hai ho gaya na ho gaya ab ho gaya ab ho gaya theek hai.
Executive: Ab ab jaiye wo profile mein jaha pe aapka wo number aap jo open karke baithe the na jaise aapka profile mein theek hai wahi upar naam ke jo number hai waha jaiye aap ek baar.
Customer: Ha pahunch gaya sir.
Executive: Aap usme kya kariye ab jaise jo number aa raha hai aapka primary secondary wala theek hai sir.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai pehle secondary number ko waha se delete kariye waha se same number jo cheez abhi delete kariye pehle waha se apna number ye secondary wala.
Customer: Kar diya sir.
Executive: Theek hai kara ji ek minute ha.
Customer: Bhai wo OTP to wo dusre number pe ja raha hai na.
Executive: Nahi to aapke paas abhi number hai sir secondary wala pehle wala dono hai aapke paas ya nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi mere paas jo hai wo ek hi number hai secondary wala.
Executive: Primary number kiske paas hai.
Customer: Wo wo dusre ke paas hai.
Executive: To actually sir wahi hai na business karne ke liye to chahiye hoga fir number kyuki OTP jayega pehle.
Customer: To wo kiska hai number waise kiska number hai wo waise 282 wala.
Executive: Dusre ka hai wo jo hai number mujhe OTP nahi de raha hai na wo.
Executive: To hai kaun matlab aap koi aap aap company aapki hai sir to aapne dala kiska number hai matlab aap koi janne wale hain.
Customer: Aisa tha sir aisa tha maine jo tha sir wo unhe de di thi chalane ke liye theek hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ab wo mujhe paise nahi de rahe hain.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To ab main hatwana chah raha hu ye main chala aur ab wo mujhe nahi de raha ab wo main hu yaha par Rampur mein aur wo hai Hyderabad ab main waha par kaise jau.
Executive: Okay. To matlab owner to aap company ke owner kaun hai aap hai mainly kaun hai sir.
Customer: Ha ha main hu sir.
Executive: Aap hai na sir to aap ek kaam kariye sir isko na fir dusre tarike se change karwana padega aap mujhe ek kaam kariye aapke paas aapka GST number hoga theek hai sir.
Customer: Ha hai.
Executive: Theek hai aap GST certificate certificate hoga na GST certificate aapke paas.
Customer: Ha certificate hai.
Executive: Theek hai aap ek kaam kariye mujhe na mujhe na ek mail karna aap theek hai sir theek hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Usme aap main mere main aapko ek dunga number mein theek hai WhatsApp pe likh dena main apna primary number change karwana chah raha hu due to some reason I don't have access of matlab aap likh dena usme mere paas primary number ka access nahi hai theek hai to mera jo secondary number hai usko primary mein change kar do theek hai ye likhna hai aapko mail pe aur usme mere kya kehte hain apna GST attach kar dena sir theek hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay wo kar dijiye main aapko wo change karwa dunga abhi ek minute rukiye main aapko na bhejta hu WhatsApp pe kaise bhejna hai aapko wo dikha bhi dunga to aapko main ek minute rukiye aapko message kar deta hu ek minute rukiye line pe sir aap theek hai ek minute rukiye main aapko ab wo WhatsApp karta hu ek minute rukiye sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change primary number on IndiaMART.

- Secondary number should become primary.

- Not receiving OTP on the primary number.



Resolution:

- Executive guided to remove secondary number.

- Executive asked to mail GST certificate.

- Executive assured to change the number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send a mail with GST certificate.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- primary number, secondary number, gst, otp
